title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, March 26, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss describes the Confederate army's movements, the women of Winchester, and relates news of soldiers from Augusta County.
keywords: Troop Movement, Military Authority, Military Strategy, Prisons/Prisoners, Women, National Government, Battle Description, Death/Casualties, Family, Patriotism, American Civil War
